name: Mark English
text: The lobby where you wait for your order isn't heated.  I froze while I waited!  The pizza was okay and the crazy cinnamon pieces were okay as well.( too sweet).

name: Travis
text: Stop by on a Wednesday night and they changed their hours. You can no longer get a pizza after 8 PM. Really lousy move. The hours on Google are no longer current. â€¦More

name: Everyday Ghost
text: Disgusting. First the staff is the farthest thing from professional. Second the location got a makeover and new ownership, but the food quality got worse. This time I found hair in my pizza. Like seriously, that's just gross. You shouldn't be in business if you can't even provide food without the hair of your staff. Terrible.

name: Shane Nadeau
text: Order took unusually long for a weeknight, but it was good and not expensive

name: Margarita Rosario
text: Never ever ready and cant even tell people before we pay that we are going to have to wait... Ughhh... I'm tiered of this place not being hot and ready... Might as well pay a little extra for better and faster pizza...

name: Katey Durbin
text: My fiance loves this place but wishes it was open later. No major complaints other than that.

name: Naren Majeti
text: Good cheese pizza for a good price. Cost $5 and took 5 minutes to make. Not that big of a shop but good for people who haven't tried little Caesars yet

name: N Nn
text: Amused your taste buds for a few dollars

name: Ted Giehl
text: "Hot N Ready" is NEVER ready!

name: Eric Baxter
text: About what you would expect from the chain. Cheep pizza that's ok for what it costs.

name: Kelsie Thomasino
text: Out of bread and took 30 minutes for a half cheese half pepperoni pizza

name: Dominic Coombe
text: Great fantastic pizza yummy

name: Kilsi Espinosa
text: Descent pizza, good customer service.

name: DA Tank
text: Waited 10 mins for no reason bread was cold

name: Baaye Fevens
text: Food tasted as expected but took far too long to get our "Hot and Ready" food.

name: Ainsley Masoperh
text: Little Caesars have the best pizza, and the pizza is only $5

name: James Hughes
text: Kinda slow

name: Tim O'Leary
text: $2.00 topping charge to leave pepperoni off???

name: Mike Stefani
text: Pizza is fine....

name: Chris Lazzara
text: Nothing special but very cheap.
